The chamber that Megatron has entered is=
=A0very large and circular. Stalactites extend from high vaulting cielings,=
 although many of them no longer end in points as something has broken many=
 of them off. The room itself is extremely hot, although not beyond the cap=
acity of Cybertronian life forms. On the floor magma broils, venting steam =
and other vapors into the air of this chamber. 

In the center of the room,=
 sitting in a pool of magma=A0a=A0structure composed of metal and roughly t=
he size of a small base sits. Somehow this=A0building it is resisting the e=
ffects of the=A0heat, but=A0that resistance is slowly fading as slowly=A0th=
e building is begining to fail, falling vicitim to the Magma that pools aro=
und it.

OOC: Quick question: I know that Megatron can fly, and=A0I have sc=
ene Grimlock fly, although he never seemed very good at it, but how is Kup =
getting around? I have never seen Kup with that ability.
